alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 12:54AM CDT until April 23 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Hooker County in west central Nebraska... Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 200 AM CDT/100 AM MDT/. * At 1253 AM CDT/1153 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nenzel to 16 miles south of Mullen, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Valentine, Mullen, Thedford, Cody, Kilgore, Seneca, Nenzel, Brownlee, Merritt Reservoir, Crookston, Wood Lake, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Marsh Flat, Smith Falls State Park, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River, Kelso, Shimmons Lake and Highway 97 crossing the North Loup River. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 159 and 223. Highway 2 between mile markers 175 and 226. Highway 97 between mile markers 46 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 132 and 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 21. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
